          <title>
            <string language="en">Cracking long hydrocarbon molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knackende lange Kohlenwasserstoffmoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Longues molécules fendantes d'hydrocarbure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moléculas longas rachando do hidrocarboneto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molecole lunghe spezzantesi dell'idrocarburo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραγίζοντας μακριά μόρια υδρογονανθράκων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Moléculas largas del hidrocarburo que se 
quiebran</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the cracking of liquid decane into the smaller molecules of liquid octane and ethane gas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cracking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal decomposition</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Knacken des flüssigen 
decane in die kleineren Moleküle des flüssigen Oktan- und 
Äthangases.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre fendre du decane 
liquide dans les molécules plus petites du gaz liquide d'octane et 
d'éthane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra rachar do decane 
líquido nas moléculas menores do gás líquido do octano e do 
ethane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra spezzarsi del decane 
liquido nelle più piccole molecole del gas liquido dell'etano e 
dell'ottano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το ράγισμα του υγρού 
δεκανίου στα μικρότερα μόρια του υγρών οκτανίου και του αιθανίου
αέριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra quebrarse del decane 
líquido en las moléculas más pequeñas del gas líquido del octano 
y del etano.</string>
          </description>
